alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:43AM CDT until March 30 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 443 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Honey Grove, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Bryan County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
